article.name: What happens to the usage fee if the moving average of the number of hosts is a decimal?
article.title: What happens to the usage fee if the moving average of the number of hosts is a decimal?
article.body: If the calculation of the moving average of hosts results in a decimal, the number will be rounded up. For example, in the case of 3.2 hosts, the number will be rounded up to 4 and charges will be made accordingly.
